Class Formatter

java.lang.Object
  Formatter

public class Formatter
extends java.lang.Object

Incomplete version of a formatter class to support a simple text editor.

Version:
16/11/2015
Author:
Simon Jones (based on original code by Kenneth J. Turner)

          Remove all text in the main area.

          Search for text in main area, starting from the current cursor position.

tidyText

public void tidyText()
Tidy text in main area:
  • Ensure a single space between words and one blank line between paragraphs. Remove an extra space at the start of end of a line.
